product_name: Microsoft Xbox Series X 16GB Memory 1TB SSD Gaming Console

features.CPU: 8X Cores @ 3.8 GHz (3.66 GHz w/SMT) Custom Zen 2 CPU
features.GPU: 12 TFLOPS, 52 CUs @1.825 GHz Custom RDNA 2 GPU
features.Display: Up to 8K HDR, Frame rates of up to 120FPS

description.title: Microsoft Xbox Series X 16GB Memory 1TB SSD Gaming Console
description.details: The Microsoft Xbox Series X Gaming Console delivers sensationally smooth frame rates of up to 120FPS with the visual pop of HDR. Immerse yourself with sharper characters, brighter worlds, and impossible details with true-to-life 4K. The Xbox Series X is equipped with 8X Cores @ 3.8 GHz (3.66 GHz w/SMT) Custom Zen 2 CPU and 12 TFLOPS, 52 CUs @1.825 GHz Custom RDNA 2 GPU. It comes with 16GB GDDR6 w/320 bit-wide bus memory and 1TB Custom NVME SSD. It has a split motherboard that keeps the console"s internals evenly temperature controlled allowing for an even higher output of power. It has a heat-sink chassis that merges parallel cooling with a unique design to increase the reliability of performance. The vapor chamber in the Xbox Series X enables an even spread of temperatures within the core. A vertical airflow system keeps the console running smoothly and cooling quietly. The Microsoft Xbox Series X Gaming Console offers Up to 8K HDR and 4K UHD Blu-Ray. It also delivers up to 120 FPS. For sound capabilities, it offers  Dolby Digital 5.1, DTS 5.1, Dolby TrueHD with Atmos, and up to 7.1 L-PCM. It offers 1x HDMI 2.1 port, 3x USB 3.1 Gen 1 ports, 802.3 10/100/1000 Ethernet, and 802.11ac dual-band wireless connectivity. The Microsoft Xbox Series X Gaming Console comes with no warranty.

description.title: Sony PlayStation 5 Gaming Console Analog Edition (Japan Edition)
description.details: Sony PlayStation 5 Gaming Console comes with an ultra-high-speed SSD and deeper immersion which supports haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, 3D Audio, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation games. The exclusive PS5 is a technically impressive piece of hardware. There are the new, 10.28 TFLOPs, 36 CUs at 2.23GHz GPU, Custom RDNA 2 GPU architecture that can push 4K resolution at 120 frames per second, and the octa-core AMD Zen 2-based CPU with a 3.5GHz clock speed. It is also featured with 16GB of GDDR6 / 256-bit memory and Custom 825GB SSD. Here, The custom integration of the PS5 console's systems lets creators pull data from the SSD so quickly that they can design games in ways never before possible. The PS 5 Marvel at incredible graphics and experiences new PS5 features, these are - Ray tracing, which provides you a new level of realism as rays of light are individually simulated, creating true-to-life shadows and reflections in supported PS5 games; 4K-TV gaming and also PS5 console is compatible with 8K displays through HDMI 2.1 support. The PlayStation 5 comes with smooth and fluid high frame rate gameplay at up to 120fps for compatible games, that support for 120Hz output on 4K displays. Here, the HDR technology-supported PS5 games display an unbelievably vibrant and lifelike range of colors. You will enjoy faster and smoother frame rates in select PS4 and PS VR games. This latest PlayStation 5 gives gamers the ability to let players upgrade their disc and digital PS4 games to digital PS5 games. This PlayStation has VR integration. It will provide you with Breathtaking immersion to Discover a deeper gaming experience with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio technology, and also you will enjoy life and truly experience with Tempest 3D AudioTech. In this, Sony PlayStation 5 The DualSense wireless controller for PS5 offers immersive haptic feedback, dynamic adaptive triggers, and a built-in microphone, all integrated into an iconic design. This new exclusive PS5 featured 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray and 4K entertainment streaming also. One of the best things about the PlayStation 5 is that it acts as a bridge between generations. Your entire library of digital PS4 games is there from the moment you log into your PSN account, and any great games you missed will likely be part of the PlayStation Plus Collection. The exclusive features of the PS5 are its SSD, which significantly reduces the time it takes for games to start up, and its cutting-edge GPU, which enables ray-traced graphics and resolutions up to 4K at 120fps. The new PS5 controller is revolutionary, and the whole experience feels fresh, fast, and satisfying to use.

description.title: Sony PlayStation 5 Digital Edition Gaming Console
description.details: Sony PlayStation 5 Digital Edition is another iteration of the classic Sony PlayStation 5 Gaming Console. The PS5 Digital Edition unleashes new gaming possibilities that you never anticipated. You can experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high-speed SSD, deeper immersion with haptic feedback support, adaptive triggers, 3D Audio, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation games. Play Station 5 Digital Edition is an all-digital version of the PS5 console with no disc drive. You can sign in to your account for PlayStation Network and go to PlayStation Store to buy and download games. It has 3D audio via built-in TV speakers or analog/USB stereo headphones. This console has Ultra-High Speed SSD  letting you maximize your play sessions with near-instant load times for installed PS5 compatible games. The Integrated I/O ports of the Play Station 5 The custom integration of the PS5 Digital Editionâ€™s systems lets creators pull data from the SSD so quickly that they can design games in ways never before possible. This console supports advanced Ray Tracing which allows you to Immerse yourself in worlds with a new level of realism as rays of light are individually simulated, creating true-to-life shadows and reflections in supported PS5 games. This Console comes with 4K-TV Gaming support. You can play your favorite PS5 games on your stunning 4K TV with up to 120FPS with 120Hz output. It lets you enjoy smooth and fluid high frame rate gameplay at up to 120fps for compatible games, with support for 120Hz output on 4K displays. Playstation 5 digital edition also comes with HDR Technology which makes it compatible with an HDR TV. The supported PS5 games display an unbelievably vibrant and lifelike range of colors. For a better audio experience city has Tempest 3D AudioTech. Immerse yourself in soundscapes where it feels like the sound comes from every direction. Your surroundings truly come alive with Tempest 3D AudioTech1 in supported games. It lets you experience haptic feedback via the DualSense wireless controller in select PS5 titles and feel the effects and impact of your in-game actions through dynamic sensory feedback. It has immersive adaptive triggers, featuring dynamic resistance levels which simulate the physical impact of in-game activities in select PS5 games. This console also includes ASTROâ€™S Playroom which lets you explore four worlds, each one showcasing innovative gameplay using the versatile features of the DualSense wireless controller, this game is included for all PS5 console users. This console also has backward Compatibility & Game Boost support. The PS5 console can play over 4,000 PS4 games. With the Game Boost feature, you can even enjoy faster and smoother frame rates in some of the PS4 consoleâ€™s greatest games. This PlayStation has VR integration. You will enjoy faster and smoother frame rates in select PS4 and PS VR games. This new exclusive PS5 featured 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray and 4K entertainment streaming. The exclusive features of the PS5 are its SSD, which significantly reduces the time it takes for games to start up, and its cutting-edge GPU, which enables ray-traced graphics and resolutions up to 4K at 120fps. The new PS5 controller is revolutionary, and the whole experience feels fresh, fast, and satisfying to use. Sony PlayStation 5 Digital Edition Gaming Console offers No Warranty.
